message:
WeepingCAN Bus-Off Attack Simulator
  Stealth variant — attacker stays Error-Active throughout

Log file  : logs/weepingcan_20260219_235506.log
  JSON log  : logs/weepingcan_20260219_235506.jsonl
[ATTACKER] Pattern analysis complete → target CAN-ID=0x100  period≈10ms
[VICTIM] Preparing periodic frame  CAN-ID=0x100  seq=0x01  data=['0xde', '0xad', '0xbe', '0x1']
[ATTACKER] Building attack frame  CAN-ID=0x100  recessive-inject-at bit 30
Arbitration: SAME ID → both transmit together (WeepingCAN)
[BUS] ATTACKER injects RECESSIVE bit at position 30
[VICTIM] Preparing periodic frame  CAN-ID=0x100  seq=0x02  data=['0xde', '0xad', '0xbe', '0x2']
